text:
<@U089PPWPXT9> check this out for gardening, IMO it’s what we have been doing here for years, they just found a nice label for it :), in my Zettelkasten I call it “Begriffsgenese“

<https://blog.muni.town/chatty-community-gardens/|https://blog.muni.town/chatty-community-gardens/>

attachments.text: In the virtual world we think of digital gardens first and foremost as individual, personalized spaces. Yet in our physical cities the pro-social concept of Community Gardens is much beloved and far more accessible to the majority of city dwellers.
attachments.title: Chatty Community Gardens
